languages.text: "Это — инфоключ для активации протокола "Затмение", принадлежавший Френзо. Узел управления составами уязвим, гнев или смятение машинных духов могли бы привести к катастрофической аварии — крушению состава со снарядами или чему похуже. Потому в стены заставы вмонтированы творения Механикус, выжигающие энергию из всякого устройства".

"This is Frensoe's data-key that activates the Eclipse protocol. The train control node is vulnerable. If something were to anger or confuse the machine spirits, it could easily lead to a catastrophic accident — a trainload of crashing shells, for instance, or worse. That's why there are Tech-Priests' creations embedded in the walls: they are potent enough to rip the power out of any device."
languages.original_text: "Это — инфоключ для активации протокола "Затмение", принадлежавший Френзо. Узел управления составами уязвим, гнев или смятение машинных духов могли бы привести к катастрофической аварии — крушению состава со снарядами или чему похуже. Потому в стены заставы вмонтированы творения Механикус, выжигающие энергию из всякого устройства".

traits.locale_text: "This is Frensoe's data-key that activates the Eclipse protocol. The train control node is vulnerable. If something were to anger or confuse the machine spirits, it could easily lead to a catastrophic accident — a trainload of crashing shells, for instance, or worse. That's why there are Tech-Priests' creations embedded in the walls: they are potent enough to rip the power out of any device."

"This is a data-key that activates the 'Eclipse' protocol that Frensoe used to carry. The train control node is vulnerable, the anger or confusion of machine spirits could easily lead to a catastrophic accident, causing a trainload of shells to crash or even worse. Which is why there are Mechanicus' creations embedded in its walls, powerful enough to rip the Motive Force out of any device."

"This is a data-key that activates the 'Eclipse' protocol that Frensoe used to carry. The train-control node is vulnerable. If the anger and confusion of the machine spirit were fully unleashed, it could easily lead to a catastrophic accident — a trainload of crashing shells for instance, or something even worse. That is why there are Mechanicus creations embedded in the walls: they are powerful enough to rip the Motive Force out of any device."

"This is a data-key that activates the 'Eclipse' protocol that Frensoe used to carry. The train-control node is vulnerable. If the anger and confusion of the machine spirit were fully unleashed, it could easily lead to a catastrophic accident — a trainload of crashing shells for instance, or something even worse. That is why there are Mechanicus creations embedded in the walls: they are powerful enough to rip the Motive Force out of any device."

"This is Frensoe's data-key that activates the Eclipse protocol. The train control node is vulnerable. If something were to anger or confuse the machine spirits, it could easily lead to a catastrophic accident — a trainload of crashing shells, for instance, or worse. That's why there are Tech-Priests' creations embedded in the walls: they are potent enough to rip the power out of any device."

"This is Frensoe's data-key that activates the Eclipse protocol. The train control node is vulnerable. If something were to anger or confuse the machine spirits, it could easily lead to a catastrophic accident — a trainload of crashing shells, for instance, or worse. That's why there are Tech-Priests' creations embedded in the walls: they are potent enough to rip the power out of any device."

"This is Frensoe's data-key that activates the Eclipse protocol. The train control node is vulnerable. If something were to anger or confuse the machine spirits, it could easily lead to a catastrophic accident — a trainload of crashing shells, for instance, or worse. That's why there are Tech-Priests' creations embedded in the walls: they are potent enough to rip the power out of any device."

languages.text: «Esta es la llave de datos de Frensoe, que activa el protocolo Eclipse. El nodo de control del tren es vulnerable. Si algo enfureciera o confundiera a los espíritus máquina, podría provocar un accidente catastrófico, como el choque de un cargamento entero de munición, por ejemplo, o algo peor. Por eso hay creaciones de los tecnosacerdotes en las paredes: son lo bastante poderosas como para arrebatar la energía de cualquier dispositivo».
languages.original_text: "This is Frensoe's data-key that activates the Eclipse protocol. The train control node is vulnerable. If something were to anger or confuse the machine spirits, it could easily lead to a catastrophic accident — a trainload of crashing shells, for instance, or worse. That's why there are Tech-Priests' creations embedded in the walls: they are potent enough to rip the power out of any device."

traits.locale_text: «Esta es la llave de datos de Frensoe, que activa el protocolo Eclipse. El nodo de control del tren es vulnerable. Si algo enfureciera o confundiera a los espíritus máquina, podría provocar un accidente catastrófico, como el choque de un cargamento entero de munición, por ejemplo, o algo peor. Por eso hay creaciones de los tecnosacerdotes en las paredes: son lo bastante poderosas como para arrebatar la Fuerza Motriz de cualquier dispositivo».

languages.text: 「これは衰退プロトコルを作動させるフレンソーのデータキーです。列車制御ノードは脆い。機械精霊を怒らせたり混乱させたりするようなことがあれば、大惨事につながる可能性があります。例えば、砲弾が列車に激突するとか、もっとひどいことがあるかもしれません。壁に埋め込まれた技術司祭の制作物があるのはそのためです。それは、あらゆる装置の電力を奪うのに十分な威力があります」
languages.original_text: "This is Frensoe's data-key that activates the Eclipse protocol. The train control node is vulnerable. If something were to anger or confuse the machine spirits, it could easily lead to a catastrophic accident — a trainload of crashing shells, for instance, or worse. That's why there are Tech-Priests' creations embedded in the walls: they are potent enough to rip the power out of any device."

traits.locale_text: 「これは衰退プロトコルを作動させるフレンソーのデータキーです。列車制御ノードは脆い。機械精霊を怒らせたり混乱させたりするようなことがあれば、大惨事につながる可能性があります。例えば、砲弾が列車に激突するとか、もっとひどいことがあるかもしれません。壁に埋め込まれた技術司祭の制作物があるのはそのためです。それは、うんとパワーがあって、どんな装置からも動力を引き剥がせるのです」

languages.text: “这是弗伦索的数据秘钥，可以用来激活日蚀协议。众所周知，列车的控制节点非常脆弱。如果有什么东西激怒或迷惑了机魂，可能会导致灾难性的事故，比如满载炮弹的列车控制失灵，或者更糟。正因如此，技术神甫将他们的装置镶到了舱壁之中。这些装置非常强大，可以瞬间切断所有设备内部的电力。”
languages.original_text: "This is Frensoe's data-key that activates the Eclipse protocol. The train control node is vulnerable. If something were to anger or confuse the machine spirits, it could easily lead to a catastrophic accident — a trainload of crashing shells, for instance, or worse. That's why there are Tech-Priests' creations embedded in the walls: they are potent enough to rip the power out of any device."

traits.locale_text: “这是弗伦索的数据秘钥，可以用来激活日蚀协议。众所周知，列车的控制节点非常脆弱。如果有什么东西激怒或迷惑了机魂，可能会导致灾难性的事故，比如满载炮弹的列车控制失灵，或者更糟。正因如此，技术神甫将他们的装置镶到了舱壁之中。这些装置非常强大，可以瞬间切断所有设备内部的源力。”

languages.text: "Das ist Frensoes Datenschlüssel, der das Eclipse-Protokoll aktiviert. Der Zugsteuerpunkt ist anfällig. Würde etwas die Maschinengeister erzürnen oder verwirren, könnte das leicht zu einem katastrophalen Unfall führen, beispielsweise einem entgleisten Munitionszug oder noch Schlimmerem. Daher wurden Schöpfungen der Techpriester in die Wände integriert. Sie sind mächtig genug, um die Energie aus jedem Gerät zu reißen."
languages.original_text: "This is Frensoe's data-key that activates the Eclipse protocol. The train control node is vulnerable. If something were to anger or confuse the machine spirits, it could easily lead to a catastrophic accident — a trainload of crashing shells, for instance, or worse. That's why there are Tech-Priests' creations embedded in the walls: they are potent enough to rip the power out of any device."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist Frensoes Datenschlüssel, der das Eclipse-Protokoll aktiviert. Der Zugsteuerpunkt ist anfällig. Würde etwas die Maschinengeister erzürnen oder verwirren, könnte das leicht zu einem katastrophalen Unfall führen, beispielsweise einem entgleisten Munitionszug oder noch Schlimmerem. Daher wurden Schöpfungen der Techpriester in die Wände integriert. Sie sind mächtig genug, um die Antriebskraft aus jedem beliebigen Gerät zu reißen."

languages.text: « Voici la clé de données de Frensoe, qui permet d'activer le protocole Éclipse. Le nœud de commande du train est vulnérable. Si quelque chose devait mettre les esprits de la machine en colère, ou même ne serait-ce que les perturber, ça pourrait provoquer un incident catastrophique, comme une collision avec un chargement d'obus, ou pire. C'est pour ça que les murs sont truffés de créations des technoprêtres suffisamment puissantes pour priver n'importe quel appareil de son énergie. »
languages.original_text: "This is Frensoe's data-key that activates the Eclipse protocol. The train control node is vulnerable. If something were to anger or confuse the machine spirits, it could easily lead to a catastrophic accident — a trainload of crashing shells, for instance, or worse. That's why there are Tech-Priests' creations embedded in the walls: they are potent enough to rip the power out of any device."

traits.locale_text: « Voici la clé de données de Frensoe, qui permet d'activer le protocole Éclipse. Le nœud de commande du train est vulnérable. Si quelque chose devait mettre les esprits de la machine en colère, ou même ne serait-ce que les perturber, ça pourrait provoquer un incident catastrophique, comme une collision avec un chargement d'obus, ou pire. C'est pour ça que les murs sont truffés de créations des technoprêtres suffisamment puissantes pour priver n'importe quel appareil de a Force Motrice. »

languages.text: "Bu, Frensoe'nun Tutulma protokolünü etkinleştiren veri anahtarı. Tren kontrol nodülü saldırıya açık. Makine ruhlarını öfkelendiren ya da şaşırtan bir şey olursa felakete yol açacak bir kaza yaşanması işten bile değil. Mesela bir vagon dolusu fişek parçalanabilir, hatta daha da kötüsü olabilir. İşte bu yüzden duvarlara Tekno Rahiplerin icatları gömülü. Bu icatlar, tüm cihazların gücünü tamamen kesebilecek kadar tesirlidir."
languages.original_text: "This is Frensoe's data-key that activates the Eclipse protocol. The train control node is vulnerable. If something were to anger or confuse the machine spirits, it could easily lead to a catastrophic accident — a trainload of crashing shells, for instance, or worse. That's why there are Tech-Priests' creations embedded in the walls: they are potent enough to rip the power out of any device."
